rules_text:
Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Reconstruct {X}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
You can't sacrifice creatures or lands to pay Never Enough's reconstruct cost.
